title: (x) "Merrill, Croxley Road" angular garalde - ITC Galliard {Evan}
content:
The closest I’ve been able to come up with is a variation of Adobe Garamond.  
Any suggestions would be gratefully appreciated.

| --- | --- |
| [type.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20060523005202/http:/typophile.com/files/type_6.gif) | 2.3 KB |
author: barrie

comments.content: Off the top of my head, it appears to be Galliard and Italic. Hope I’m right.
